fr.paris.lutece.plugins.quiz.web
Class QuizJspBean

java.lang.Object
  fr.paris.lutece.plugins.quiz.web.QuizJspBean
public class QuizJspBean
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides the user interface to manage quiz features ( manage, create, modify, remove)
